job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongemuJob DescriptionuemstrongppMajor purpose This engineer will need experience in SW design digital communications modems and FPGA designppbrppstrongemuAreas of desired experience or education includeuemstrongpp Forward Error Correction FECpp Modulationpp Demodulationpp Digital filterspp Baseband samplingpp Acquisitionpp Tracking AlgorithmsppbrppstrongemuMajor functions TechnicalFunctional skills EducationExperienceLicenses etc	Qualificationsuemstrongpp Bachelors Masters preferred degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering Software Engineering or Electrical Engineeringpp 4 years of experience implementing complex modem algorithms in DSP softwarepp 4 years of equivalent experience in FPGA design with SW background will also receive considerationpp Preferred Skillspp Expertise in C and objectoriented software designpp Expertise in software design for testabilitypp Expertise in laboratory debug techniques using digital scopes logic analyzers BERTS amp other complex measurement equipmentpp Experience with TI DSP BIOS RTOS is a pluspp Familiarity with Git is a pluspp Familiarity with VHDLVerilog and MatlabSimulink is a plusppp
